title: Lemon and Thyme
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Restaurant on the Esplanade. The menu has a focus on providing healthy eating options and variety, using fresh local produce. The bar serves a range of cocktails, wines (including organic) and a selection of craft beer on tap. Live entertainment on selected evenings with local artists. Their menu has a few vegan options, including a pumpkin curry and a vegie stack. There are also several vegan options on the tapas menu.
